strengths: Extremely difficult to assault — PDS network + abilities
Quash (cancel an agenda) and Instinct Training are sellable services
Flagship is the primary offensive weapon
weaknesses: Diplomacy strategy card often unavailable early when you need it most
Duranium Armor disadvantage — opponents sustain through your PDS
Ground force clusters bypass your space defenses
tips: Execute defensive abilities but maintain scoring focus — don't over-invest in defense
Acquire flagship rapidly but protect it from early loss
Secure a slightly expanded territory slice with PDS network lock-down
Emphasize influence acquisition (command tokens fuel ability usage)
Commercialize abilities: sell Quash and Instinct Training for trade goods/favors
Pursue Cruiser II for mobility or place Space Dock IIs on borders for expansion
Defensive abilities define the faction; offense comes exclusively from flagship

techPaths.name: Yellow + Blue (with blue skip R1)
techPaths.note: Optimal; round 1 Gravity Drive solves mobility
